Title: Apple Thief
Writer: Mark Banker (story), Mark Banker, Tom Herpich, Patrick McHale (story), Patrick McHale, Kent Osborne (story), Kent Osborne, Pendleton Ward (story), Pendleton Ward, Bert Youn
Actors: Jeremy Shada, John DiMaggio, Polly Lou Livingston, Rich Fulcher
Plot: After Tree Trunks finds her apples have gone missing, Finn and Jake search the criminal underworld of the Candy Kingdom to recover them.
